title: Chapter 944 - Those Are My Rules
body:
Chapter 944 - Those Are My Rules

Cui Longxiang was already dead…

Weng Xuanshan sank into silence.

He was actually well aware that the Adjudicator of the Netherworld had inexplicably disappeared after an encounter with the Netherworld Vessel in the far reaches of the Sea of Bitterness, and that the ancient Cui Family had faced upheaval ever since.

They weren’t exactly doomed, but they no longer had the confidence to intimidate everyone around them.

They’d faced potential disaster not long ago, on the night of the Lantern Festival.

Although they avoided calamity in the end, everyone knew that without Cui Longxiang to hold down the fort, it would be difficult to maintain their status as a peak faction much longer. They were no longer threatening.

Second Elder Wei Jingkui’s words were unquestionable proof of that.

“That’s still Cui Chang’an’s daughter. If you take this too far, you’ll still bring trouble upon Night Demon Mountain,” Weng Xuanshan said thoughtfully. “Besides, fish and dragons intermingle in the City of Safe Returns. This is a gathering point for experts of too many factions to count. Even if you seal off the arena, there’s no way to keep this under wraps.”

Wei Jingkui smiled. “You needn’t worry,...
